about_the_game:
Character Pass Vol. 1 features a set of 2 DLC, A moment in Infinity and The Devil's Comeback, that can be used in SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream.

Character Pass Vol. 1 includes:
- A moment in Infinity
• 1 Additional Character
• New additional scenario
• Costumes for additional character
• Weapon for additional character
• Stamp for additional character
• Additional player card background
• Additional weapons
- The Devil's Comeback
• 2 Additional Characters
• New additional scenario
• Costumes for additional characters
• Weapon for additional characters
• Stamp for Additional characters
• Additional player card background
• Additional weapons
- Character Pass Vol. 1 Bonus: Bonus Stamp Set

*This product also includes content that may be sold individually. Please take care not to make duplicate purchases.
